name: mist
flavor_text: The user cloaks itself and its allies in a white mist that prevents any of their stats from being lowered for five turns.
effect_text_extend:
Pok√©mon on the user's side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns.

guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used.

defog used by an opponent will end this effect.
effect_text_simple: Protects the user's stats from being changed by enemy moves.
